text: Vigia is a municipality in the northeastern part of the state of Pará, Brazil. The town was founded on 16 January 1616. The population is 51,173 (2015 est.) in an area of 539.08 km².Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatística ==Population history== {| class="wikitable" ! Year !! title: Vigia, Pará
